Package org.svvrl.goal.core.io

Class TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.XMLCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AutomatonCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
org.svvrl.goal.core.io.TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec
All Implemented Interfaces:
Codec
public class TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec
extends AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
A TwoWayAltAutomatonCodec can encode a two-way alternating automaton in GOAL file format (GFF) and decode a GFF file back to a two-way alternating automaton. This codec is part of GFFCodec and has no name, file extension, and description.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

      public AltTransition decodeTransition​(org.w3c.dom.Element e, Automaton aut) throws CodecException
      Description copied from class: AutomatonCodec
      Decodes an XML element as a transition.
      Overrides:
      decodeTransition in class AbstractAltAutomatonCodec
      Parameters:
      e - an XML element to be decoded
      aut - the automaton corresponding to the GFF file to be decoded
      Returns:
      the transition in aut represented by e
      Throws:
      CodecException - if the tag name or the tid attribute is invalid, or the source state or the destination state cannot be found in aut
